CustomField.formula: IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 20, (Actual_Service_Date__c -Today())*10)& IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, IF ( TEXT(End_Date__c) <> "", End_Date__c - Actual_Service_Date__c , 1 ) * 20)& IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 20, (Today()-Actual_Service_Date__c)*10)
